resources.string: This part should display a very brief summary of the woman. No more than 2 sentences.

This part of the page should display the main body of the bio. This will be filled with more info than the title or the quick summary above. It won't have too much info though, enough to interest people if they wanted to fin out more but not too much to put people off. Include a wikipedia link (if it exists).
